custom-sql.sql: SELECT CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className AS className, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK AS classPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, COUNT(*) as count FROM CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent WHERE (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK != 0) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType == ?) AND (CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.alias == ?) AND GROUP BY CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK, CT_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType
